title: "Lawmakers ask DOJ for antitrust probe of Apple for shutting down iMessage on Android"
text: "A bipartisan group of four US senators and representatives asked the Department of Justice whether Apple violated antitrust laws for shutting down an application that enabled Android devices to text iPhone users via iMessage."

title: "Why Costco Rallied Today"
text: "A Wall Street analyst upgraded the stock today. Investors may be piling in ahead of the upcoming $15 special dividend."

title: "Ives: Expect Apple to have a $4 trillion market cap next year"
source_name: Senior Equity Analyst at Wedbush Securities
date: joins Bloomberg Radio and reacts to Apple's new they will halt watch sales."
